title: NOD32 2.7 Repack
description:
This is NOD32 2.7 comes with a trial crack, This version is very light weight.

Runs on Windows 2000, XP, Vista and 7

From readme.txt
--
nod32 2.7 repack.

1.Run nentenst.exe
2.After installation is complete when prompted do not restart.
3.Run NOD32.FiX.v2.1-nsane.exe
4.Restart when prompted.

Your trial is now near never ending =)
--

Important! : If this fails to update (You will get a message [The virus db is out of date update] or something to this affect) you will need to keep hitting the update button within the control centre to get your first virus def update - afterwards it is automated. Usually about 2 or 3 taps of update will do the trick.

Enjoy =)
